page.title: 06EAST GRINSTEAD OCCUPATIONS
page.content: The bulk of the population in this area live on the housing estates. Most of the remainder are scattered in the farms & cottages or in good sized country houses. These last are well off and have a range of higher income occupations: business men, bankers, stock-brokers, accountants etc. Many in the smaller scattered properties are farmers, farm workers, herdsmen etc. Most people work locally; traders & light industrial workers in and around East Grinstead. Of those living in the town many work in the local shops offices & schools. Many are employed at Gatwick Airport. A lot are in the building trades, there being no shortage of construction work in this affluent area. Ther are a fair number of people who commute to work in Croydon & London. Only the heavy industries are not well represented.
